âœ… Velocity Update: v[i](t+1) = wÂ·v[i](t) + câ‚Â·râ‚Â·(pbest[i] - x[i](t)) + câ‚‚Â·râ‚‚Â·(gbest - x[i](t))

âœ… Normalization: _normalise(val, denom) with safe division handling
âœ… Cost Aggregation: w_mean * mean + w_max * max for robust optimization
